content: FX 3 Support plates Support plates to create a stable base for narrow material when fastening with F-BT-MR SN fusion threaded studs ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Provides a stable base for fastening narrow material when using F-BT studs with sealing washer Helps you maximize the performance of multiple studs and fastened materials (suitable for Stud Fusion only) Applications Fastening to steel in polluted/corrosive environments (up to C5) involving higher tensile loads or thinner base materials Steel fastening in oil and gas offshore installations – cable tray/ladder supports, non-critical pipe supports, multi-disciplinary supports and miscellaneous equipment fastenings Steel fastening in oil and gas onshore installations – cable tray/ladder supports, non-critical pipe supports, multi-disciplinary supports and miscellaneous equipment fastenings Shipbuilding – false ceiling fixing, inspection grids, water spray separators, outfitting, supports for electric/piping/ventilation services ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Multi-purpose fastening (electrical, mechanical elements and support system fastenings) For use with (tools): FX 3 Material composition: Ultramid® A3WG10 Technical Data | Application | Multi-purpose fastening (electrical, mechanical elements and support system fastenings) | For use with (tools) | FX 3 | Material composition | Ultramid® A3WG10 | Environmental Conditions | Outdoor, areas with heavy industrial pollution | Base materials | Carbon steel ### ITEMS- 2360102 - Support plate FX 3-SP S - Package Size 200 pc - 2360103 - Support plate FX 3-SP L - Package Size 200 pc
tag_description: Support plates to create a stable base for narrow material when fastening with F-BT-MR SN fusion threaded studs
